resources.string: Welcome to PBHarmony! Are you looking for your PB and J soul- mate? Well look no further! Take the personality survey, and let PBHarmony make your PB and J match!

Your soul-sandwich is the basic, yet delicious peanut butter and jelly. Simpler can be better in some cases, and you realize that. Sometimes, the old but tested ways of doing things can get the job done, and the standard PB and J is a prime example.

As someone who enjoys nature and being outdoors, or just being completely untamed, you like to bring your love of nature into many aspects of your life, including into your PB and J\'s. Take out the jelly, substitute it for fruit, and what you are left with is a wholesome sandwich with a freshness that can only come from the mother nature her self.

You know you are styling on a regular basis, and welcome the fact that all eyes are on you throughout the day. Let the world know you deserve all the attention by whipping up a grilled peanut butter, banana, and bacon sandwich, similar to the sandwich that Elvis so often enjoyed.

Thinking outside of the box is your specialty. You show your creative intuition when you come up with ways to improve anything and everything around you. What could be a more creative improvement to a PB and J than deep-frying it? Come to think of it, how many things in this world aren\'t improved upon when you fry them?

As the title of this sandwich suggests, you are livin\' large. You dwell in excess. It\'s how you live your life and you wouldn\'t choose any other way of living. Naturally, you are a perfect match for this super-sized rendition of the tasty PB and J.

It\'s safe to say that you are far from bland. You are one who wants socialize and make exciting things happen around you for own amusement. Your sandwich is involves an exciting twist to an all-time classics, which is the addition of arguably the highest-rated hot sauce in our day and age: Sriracha!
